lexUnit.name: hidden.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: blocked from view by another entity

sentence.text: Melissa took a step forward and saw that she was clinging to the cast-iron pillar with both hands , her face half hidden among the foliage , her shoulders heaving .
After a while , a stream develops on the right which you have to cross by the plank bridge hidden among the trees -- watch out because it 's easily missed .
The path and the valley are actually a trap created by a flock of Harpies who nest in a small cave hidden among the rocks .
The grass grew wild , and the heavy bunches of grapes were almost hidden amongst the vine leaves .
A rustic bench surrounding it gave me the foothold I needed to get up into its branches and I sat there hidden among the blossoms while the baulked beast quested in the flower beds .
I could not see him well ; he was mainly hidden behind trees , and motionless .
The sun was still hidden behind Spyglass Hill , which came down to the sea in dangerous cliffs on this side of the island .
The third was the communal gardens , hidden behind the housing facades , green oases growing vegetables , fruit trees , herbs and flowers .
For years it was hidden behind other trees and rhododendron bushes .
One conclusive test was conducted by an American bishop , suspicious that there might be a ventriloquist hidden behind a curtain .
Colloquially known as la piscine , so named after the nearby disused les Tourelles swimming pool , the complex of modern and antiquated buildings was hidden behind an eighteen-foot high wall .
The suggestion is of steeply rising broken ground , and one figure at the top left ( hardly visible in the photograph ) is half hidden behind such a fold in the land .
It was led by Father Reynard , his russet gown now hidden beneath a gold and scarlet cope .
The execution stake was now hidden beneath its wall of flame .
Hens and geese were picking around in two small haystacks and fleets of tiny yellow chickens were half hidden beneath some planking and under the foundations of some rickety sheds .
For the past 300 years the substantial remains of one of medieval England 's most important fortresses have lain hidden beneath part of the city centre .
It turned very cold in the evening , with the summit of the mountain periodically hidden in mist , but as the sun set we had a magnificent view .
The grain may be in a pocket , hidden inside a box , or out of sight above the horse on a bird table .
She curled her fingers around the shard in her palm , slipped it back into the thin pouch of cotton hidden inside the skirts of her dress .
The odd , lugubrious figure sitting on a stool at the bar was now completely hidden from view along with the half-caste man yanking the arm of the one-armed bandit a few yards away .
A bulging section provides the crux and allows access to rock of a far more amendable angle in the form of a large slab hidden from the foot of the cliff .
The light was on and Phoebe was sitting on the bed with Maggie 's arms wrapped convulsively around her , her scarlet and sparkling body thus partly hidden from her grandmother .
Her voice was low , her face hidden from me under the hood .
You said her face was partially hidden under an anorak hood . "
He was a tall man with dark hair that was always hidden under a hat .
The lines on her high forehead and the broken blood vessels on her cheeks were partially hidden under a veil of face powder , and she had dragged a bright red lipstick around her mouth .
Next morning the spring flowers were all hidden under deep snow .
Everything was there except a crucifix , and I did n't doubt that this was hidden underneath a thick petticoat .
The vagrant 's hands were covered by woollen gloves and his face was hidden underneath a navy blue balaclava .
Her shoulder-length blond hair was hidden underneath a New York Yankees baseball cap , a present from Mike Graham .
He took out his wallet , hoping to find something hidden within the pigskin .
Surreptitiously , her hand hidden within the furry confines of her muff , Anne made the sign of the cross .
LAST WEEK 'S announcement that a gigantic cloud of dark gas has been found in space is leading to speculation about an ` invisible mass " hidden within it .
The ship he was on was , he and his men hoped , hidden from view in the shadow of the large island in the centre of the gulf .
Thanks to King Hezekiah 's hidden water tunnel , the city narrowly escaped destruction .
A circular shaped fence is harder to protect because of hidden angles .
